title.native: ワールド・コーリング

description: Music video from the IA x JIN project.

tags.name: Vocal Synth
tags.description: Features one or more singers or characters that are products of a synthesize singing program. Popular examples are Vocaloids, UTAUloids, and CeVIOs.

alternative: Liia Kailo (リイア カイロ)

node.description:
[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

 Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki-P is a sound producer, composer, and arranger from Japan He was influenced by his keyboardist uncle and started learning keyboard at the age of 6. He has also been influenced by bands such as THE BACK HORN and composers such as Satoru Kosaki.  He is a relatively new producer, having only been active since early 2011, but is quickly becoming well known. On September 30, 2011, Jin submitted the song “Kagerou Days” (カゲロウデイズ) to Nico Nico Douga. The song quickly gained popularity and has since been viewed more than 3,000,000 times.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/bahijd) | [Tumblr](http://bahijd.tumblr.com/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/bahijd)

Freelance animator from Austria who gained attraction on the internet thanks to his gif animations, which then served as a stepping stone for him joining the industry. Made his proper debut on [Shinichirou Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/97009/)'s adaptation of [Kids on the Slope](https://anilist.co/anime/12531/). His cuts are often heavily layered, exploiting the unique potential of digital processing.

**Notable works outside anime:**
- Skullgirls (Video Game, 2012) (Character and Effects Animation)
- Carpainter - Digital Harakiri (Music Album, 2015) (Cover Illustration)
- Death Stranding (Video Game, 2019) (Concept Art)

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

 Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki-P is a sound producer, composer, and arranger from Japan He was influenced by his keyboardist uncle and started learning keyboard at the age of 6. He has also been influenced by bands such as THE BACK HORN and composers such as Satoru Kosaki.  He is a relatively new producer, having only been active since early 2011, but is quickly becoming well known. On September 30, 2011, Jin submitted the song “Kagerou Days” (カゲロウデイズ) to Nico Nico Douga. The song quickly gained popularity and has since been viewed more than 3,000,000 times.

__[Website](http://1stplace.co.jp/ia/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/IA_ONE_Official)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/IA.WORLD.PAGE)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ia_official_1stplace/)__

__IA__ is a Japanese VOCALOID developed and distributed by 1st Place Co., Ltd. Initially released on January of 2012 for the VOCALOID3 engine. Her new voicebank, "IA ROCKS" was released in June 2014. Her voice is provided by the Japanese female singer, [Lia](https://anilist.co/staff/101513/Lia), known for the song "Tori no Uta".

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)
